dev-1.x.name: drupal/strip_utf8mb4

security-coverage.message: Project has not opted into security advisory coverage!

dev-1.x.description: This module helps in preventing PDO exceptions caused by MySQL general error of Incorrect string value, Enabling this module will have your site reject overly long 2 byte sequences, as well as characters above U+10000, reject overly long 3 byte sequences and UTF-16.
